edu.ou.asgbook.io.KmlWriter

edu.ou.asgbook.io.KmlWriter Class Reference

Writes data out in KML form, for display in Google Earth or similar program. More...

Detailed Description

Writes data out in KML form, for display in Google Earth or similar program.

Author:
Valliappa.Lakshmanan

Member Function Documentation

static void edu.ou.asgbook.io.KmlWriter.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00132                                                             {
00133         LatLonGrid grid = new LatLonGrid(100, 200, -1, new LatLon(35,-97), 0.1, 0.1);
00134         for (int i=0; i < grid.getNumLat(); ++i){
00135             for (int j=0; j < grid.getNumLon(); ++j){
00136                 grid.getData()[i][j] = i + j;
00137                 if ( i%10 == 0 || j%20 == 0){
00138                     grid.getData()[i][j] = grid.getMissing();
00139                 }
00140             }
00141         }
00142         File outputDir = OutputDirectory.getDefault("kmlwriter");
00143         KmlWriter.write(grid, outputDir, "kmlwriter", PngWriter.createHotColormap());
00144     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.io.KmlWriter.write ( List< LatLon >  points,
List< String >  names,
File  outputDir,
String  dataName 
) throws Exception [static] 

00088                                                                                                                         {
00089         // create KML doc
00090         Document doc = DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance().newDocumentBuilder().newDocument();
00091         Element root = doc.createElement("kml");
00092         doc.appendChild(root);
00093         Element docE = doc.createElement("Document");
00094         root.appendChild(docE);
00095         for (int i=0; i < points.size(); ++i){
00096             Element placemark = doc.createElement("Placemark");
00097             docE.appendChild(placemark);
00098             Element name = doc.createElement("name");
00099             placemark.appendChild(name);
00100             if (names != null && i < names.size()){
00101                 name.setTextContent(names.get(i));
00102             } else {
00103                 name.setTextContent(dataName + "#" + (i+1));
00104             }
00105             Element point = doc.createElement("Point");
00106             placemark.appendChild(point);
00107             Element coords = doc.createElement("coordinates");
00108             point.appendChild(coords);
00109             coords.setTextContent(points.get(i).getLon() + "," + points.get(i).getLat() + ",0.");
00110         }
00111         
00112         // write out
00113         File filename = new File(outputDir.getAbsolutePath() + "/" + dataName + ".kml");
00114         Transformer t = TransformerFactory.newInstance().newTransformer();
00115         t.setOutputProperty(OutputKeys.INDENT, "yes");
00116         t.setOutputProperty("{http://xml.apache.org/xslt}indent-amount", "2");
00117         t.transform(new DOMSource(doc), new StreamResult(filename));
00118         System.out.println("Wrote " + filename + " to refer to " + names.size() + " placemarks");
00119     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.io.KmlWriter.write ( List< LatLon >  points,
File  outputDir,
String  dataName 
) throws Exception [static] 

00080                                                                                                     {
00081         List<String> names = new ArrayList<String>();
00082         for (int i=0; i < points.size(); ++i){
00083             names.add(dataName + " " + (i+1) );
00084         }
00085         write(points, names, outputDir, dataName);
00086     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.io.KmlWriter.write ( LatLonGrid  grid,
File  outputDir,
String  dataName,
ColorModel  colormap 
) throws Exception [static] 

00032                                                                                                                      {
00033         // write image
00034         File imgFileName = new File(outputDir.getAbsolutePath() + "/" + dataName + ".png");
00035         PngWriter.writeAutoScaled(grid, imgFileName, colormap);
00036         
00037         // create KML
00038         Document doc = DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance().newDocumentBuilder().newDocument();
00039         Element root = doc.createElement("kml");
00040         doc.appendChild(root);
00041         Element folder = doc.createElement("Folder");
00042         root.appendChild(folder);
00043         Element folderName = doc.createElement("name");
00044         folder.appendChild(folderName);
00045         folderName.setTextContent(dataName);
00046         Element folderDesc = doc.createElement("description");
00047         folderDesc.setTextContent(dataName + " created by " + KmlWriter.class.getCanonicalName() + " for " + System.getProperty("java.user") + " on " + new Date());
00048         Element goverlay = doc.createElement("GroundOverlay");
00049         folder.appendChild(goverlay);
00050         Element icon = doc.createElement("Icon");
00051         goverlay.appendChild(icon);
00052         Element href = doc.createElement("href");
00053         icon.appendChild(href);
00054         href.setTextContent(dataName + ".png");
00055         Element box = doc.createElement("LatLonBox");
00056         goverlay.appendChild(box);
00057         Element north = doc.createElement("north");
00058         north.setTextContent("" + grid.getNwCorner().getLat());
00059         box.appendChild(north);
00060         Element south = doc.createElement("south");
00061         south.setTextContent("" + grid.getSeCorner().getLat());
00062         box.appendChild(south);
00063         Element east = doc.createElement("east");
00064         east.setTextContent("" + grid.getSeCorner().getLon());
00065         box.appendChild(east);
00066         Element west = doc.createElement("west");
00067         west.setTextContent("" + grid.getNwCorner().getLon());
00068         box.appendChild(west);
00069         box.appendChild(north);
00070 
00071         // write KML
00072         File kmlFileName = new File(outputDir.getAbsolutePath() + "/" + dataName + ".kml");
00073         Transformer t = TransformerFactory.newInstance().newTransformer();
00074         t.setOutputProperty(OutputKeys.INDENT, "yes");
00075         t.setOutputProperty("{http://xml.apache.org/xslt}indent-amount", "2");
00076         t.transform(new DOMSource(doc), new StreamResult(kmlFileName));
00077         System.out.println("Wrote " + kmlFileName + " to refer to image");
00078     }
